ud6.2:6.1: kho → ye ca kho (bj) | ye ca te (s1-3) | ye nu ke ci kho (pts1) | ye te (^sn3.11#1 [11. Sattajaṭilasutta]) | ye nu kho keci (?)
ud6.2:6.4: tesaṃ → etesaṃ (s1-3, pts1), aññatare”ti → aññatarāti (bj, mr) | aññataroti (s1-3, pts1)
ud6.2:10.1: corā → carā (^sn3.11#1 [11. Sattajaṭilasutta]), gacchanti → āgacchanti (bj, s1-3, pts1)
ud6.2:10.2: osārissāmi → otarissāmi (bj, s1-3) | oyāyissāmi (bj-a, s-a) | osāpayissāmi (pts1 ^sn3.11#1 [11. Sattajaṭilasutta])
